### Feature

**As a** [role]  
**I need** [functionality]  
**So that** [benefit]  

### Details & Assumptions

- document what you know here...

### Acceptance Criteria

```gherkin
Given [some initial state]
When [some event]
Then [some measurable outcome]
```
